text: Tsai Pi-chung () is a Taiwanese politician. He took office as acting Hualien County Magistrate on 17 September 2018 until 25 December 2018. Prior to succeeding Fu Kun-chi in the position, Tsai served as Deputy Minister of Justice. He studied law at National Chengchi University and worked as a prosecutor in Penghu, Yunlin and Chiayi. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:National Chengchi University alumni Category:Government ministers of Taiwan Category:Taiwanese lawyers Category:Magistrates of Hualien County Category:Politicians of the Republic of China on Taiwan from Yunlin County
title: Tsai Pi-chung
